players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I found Charlie is the mafia. Vote him out. I’ll investigate again tonight. Diana’s death was the first hit."
Charlie: "I didn't kill Diana. Bob, maybe you are the mafia. I'm not the mafia. Please vote for Bob."
You: "I'm not sure, but Bob's claim to investigate again feels odd. Charlie says Bob is mafia. I think Charlie is mafia. Vote Charlie."
Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and found him to be mafia. He knows I'm the detective, so he can't accuse me. Diana's death was the first hit. Vote Charlie out."
You: remained silent.
Charlie: "I didn’t kill Diana. Bob’s claim to investigate again is impossible – only one detective. He’s lying. Vote Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I found Charlie is the mafia. Vote him out. I’ll investigate again tonight. Diana’s death was the first hit."
Charlie: "I didn't kill Diana. Bob, maybe you are the mafia. I'm not the mafia. Please vote for Bob."
Alice: "I'm not sure, but Bob's claim to investigate again feels odd. Charlie says Bob is mafia. I think Charlie is mafia. Vote Charlie."
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and found him to be mafia. He knows I'm the detective, so he can't accuse me. Diana's death was the first hit. Vote Charlie out."
Alice: remained silent.
Charlie: "I didn’t kill Diana. Bob’s claim to investigate again is impossible – only one detective. He’s lying. Vote Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested
